nodes.text: A Mon Calamari male  was a nobleman and the father of a Mon Calamari who hid in the ocean dunes of Karnac after skipping bail during the New Republic Era. A bounty was later placed on the nobleman's son, which was acquired and subsequently abandoned by the Mandalorian bounty hunter Din Djarin around 9 ABY.
The Mon Calamari nobleman was mentioned in Chapter 3 of Jon Favreau's 2019 Disney+ television series The Mandalorian, which aired on November 22, 2019.
